title: Rust fails to compile on OS X
body:
I just tried compiling 567b90ff095076054c98fa2f08d6c552ae60968d on Mac OS X v10.10 and I got the following error:

```
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://doc.rust-lang.org/complement-bugreport.html
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace
task 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: end <= self.len()', /Users/ulyssecarion/rust/rust/src/libcore/slice.rs:432

stack backtrace:
   1:        0x10ccf411f - rt::backtrace::imp::write::h1f139311af8be11d3Ux
```
